item.description:
*******UPDATE*******

We will meet off of exit 57 off of I-95. When you get off the exit, call me (203)209-7779, and I will let you know which parking lot we are meeting in. We will carpool over to the park depending on how many of us there are! :)


Westwoods Trail System contails 39 miles of trails on 1,200 acres containing a wide diversity of interesting natural formations such as cave structures, waterfalls, salt & fresh water marshes, inland tidal lake, carved rock sculptures and rock formations.

So you know, I've gotta check this place out! This will be an exploratory hike of 4-5 miles. We will loop it. I have never been here before, but I am very excited to check it out. I will have an expert guide with me (my dad, of course) to help us find the very coolest things to see on our loop!

After the hike we will stop at the Chowder Pot for some delicious food! (optional).


Contact: Amanda (203) 209-7779

group.name: The Hartford Area Hikingâ„¢ Meetup Group

item.name: Explore Westwoods in Guilford!
